name: Roo Code
key_features: AI-powered autonomous coding agent inside VS Code
Reads and writes files in the workspace
Runs terminal commands and automates browser actions
Supports custom modes and tools via the Model Context Protocol (MCP)
Integrates with OpenAI-compatible or custom APIs and local models
supported_models: Any OpenAI-compatible or custom API/model (including local models via MCP)
pricing_model: Open-source; users provide API keys and pay for model usage
